models.name: todo_list_members
models.description: Stores authentication credentials and identity information for todo list users. Each member has a unique email and hashed password for secure login.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address used for authentication. Must be unique across the system.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Hashed password using bcrypt algorithm with cost factor 12. Never stores plain text passwords.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this user account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp. If null, account is active; if set, account is logically deleted.

models.name: todo_list_member_roles
models.description: Defines the user roles available in the system. Currently only supports 'member' role. Each member is linked to exactly one role.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_member_id
foreignFields.description: References the member who holds this role. {@link todo_list_members.id}.

plainFields.name: role_name
plainFields.description: The name of the role. Must be exactly 'member' as this system supports only one role.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this role assignment was created.

models.name: todo_list_todos
models.description: Todo items owned by members. Each todo represents a personal task that can be toggled between active and completed states. This model is primary as users directly manage these items independently through creation, editing, status toggling, and deletion operations. References todo_list_members to ensure data ownership. Never modified after completion.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_member_id
foreignFields.description: Owner of this todo item. {@link todo_list_members.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The task title. Must be 1-255 characters, non-empty, non-whitespace only. Preserves internal whitespace but trims leading/trailing spaces.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current state of the todo item. Must be exactly 'active' or 'completed'. Newly created items have 'active' status. Title cannot be edited when status is 'completed'.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was created. Always set to current time in Asia/Seoul timezone upon creation. Never modified.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the todo item was last modified (title updated or status toggled). Always updated on changes. Not set on creation.
